main_definition: MediaWiki is an open-source wiki software, a type of website that allows collaborative editing by multiple users.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The name of the free and open-source wiki software
meanings_and_examples.example: The Wikipedia online encyclopedia uses MediaWiki for its content management.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An instance or site powered by MediaWiki
meanings_and_examples.example: MediaWiki is used to operate various community-driven websites, such as the English version of Wikipedia and Wikihow.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The software package that supports wiki functionality
meanings_and_examples.example: When setting up a new online collaborative platform, administrators may choose MediaWiki to facilitate its development.
